headline: Fmr. Tesla President: Musk, Board Betting on AI
summary: Jon McNeill, co-founder of DVx Ventures and VistaShares and former Tesla president, says he's betting on Elon Musk to lead advances in robotics and aerospace, adding Musk is "especially skilled to do that." He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close."
